text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-observation-triggeredbytype-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-triggeredbytype5.0.0  re-runRe-run (per policy)Performance of the same test but with different parameters/settings/solution.
http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-triggeredbytype5.0.0  reflexReflexPerformance of one or more other tests depending on the results of the initial test. This may include collection of additional specimen. While a new ServiceRequest is not required to perform the additional test, where it is still needed (e.g., requesting another laboratory to perform the reflex test), the Observation.basedOn would reference the new ServiceRequest that requested the additional test to be performed as well as the original ServiceRequest to reflect the one that provided the authorization.
http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-triggeredbytype5.0.0  repeatRepeat (per policy)Performance of the same test again with the same parameters/settings/solution.

name: R5ObservationTriggeredbytypeForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.TriggeredBytype for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-triggeredbytype|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-triggeredbytype|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `Observation.triggeredBy.type`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-triggeredbytype|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
